name: Miano's Deathmatch!
description: Hello the my fellow Doomers. DMstuff Productions brings you a new DM pack containing some of my finest maps ever made. I put quite a bit of tender, love, and care into making this. There are a couple of weapon modifications; Faster pistol/chaingun. Nothing too drastic though. I threw in a few easter eggs in some maps just for the lulz.
